Package jetbrains.mps.core.aspects.constraints.rules

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Rule<C extends Context>
    Constraints rule is a basic notion of the new constraints (2019.2).
    RuleKind
    Rules are supposed to be of different kinds.
    RulesConstraintsAspect  
    RulesConstraintsDescriptor
    Common interface for all the constraints descriptors.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BaseRule<C extends Context>
    all generated rules inherit this one
    BaseRulesConstraintsDescriptor
    Base class for the generated constraints descriptors.
    LegacyAndRulesConstraintsDescriptor
    Temporal adapter, it is supposed to be used until the new functionality completely replaces the older one Here we combine legacy canBe* and new (rules) canBe* constraints Basic idea is for the legacy functions to dominate the rules.
    RuleId
    rule identifier
    RulesConstraintsRegistry
    Place where all the constraints rules descriptors got into initialization
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    RulesConstraintsDescriptor.DescriptorIsNotInitialized
